lead_paragraph: KLEBANOFF--Michael. Heartfelt condolences to devoted and loving Angelica, to beloved daughters Karyn and Sandra, grandchildren David, Erica and Corinne on the loss of your brilliant husband, father and grandfather, our cousin Mike. Funk and Doktori Family 1/3
